ActivityMetadata.Name: GH List repositories in an organization migration
ActivityMetadata.Label: GH List repositories in an organization migration
ActivityMetadata.Description: List all the repositories for this organization migration.
ActivityMetadata.HelpHtml:
# Github

List repositories in an organization migration

List all the repositories for this organization migration.

Method: Get

OperationID: migrations/list-repos-for-org

EndPoint:

/orgs/{org}/migrations/{migration_id}/repositories
